name: @zephyr-js/cli
description: Zephyr - Modern Node.js meta framework designed to provide the best developer experience possible (@cli)

scripts.dev: ncc build src/index.ts -w -o dist & cp -R src/templates dist
scripts.build: ncc build src/index.ts -o dist --minify --no-cache --no-source-map-register & cp -R src/templates dist
